summary: a dark color scheme for both gui and terminal
name: Diablo3
description:
Diablo3 is a color scheme inspired by molokai. It supports both gui and 256-color term.

=========================================

Screenshots

gui: http://i.imgur.com/aANR9.png

terminal (1.41) : http://i.imgur.com/eIFi5.png

terminal (1.21): http://i.imgur.com/HEAKT.png

=========================================

Options:

If you want to set long line warning, copy this in your vimrc:

  let g:diablo3_longline = 1


The default length of a line is 120, you can change it by putting
the following in your vimrc:

  let g:diablo3_len = 79

Notice the length here is the length you want to set plus 1.


Links:

* Bitbucket: https://bitbucket.org/vayn/diablo3-colorscheme

=========================================

 BTW Diablo is my favorite game series :D
install_details: Just copy the file to "~/.vim/colors" or in "<your vim directory>\vimfiles\colors" on Windows.

versions.release_notes: * Tweak the bad look of pyflakes in term
* Totally change term background color and other colors. (See new screenshot of terminal)

* Tweak some color
* Add options for LongLine Warning
